OrgName.entry: GREENTOP COMMUNITY CIRCUS - VENUES FOR HIRE

Desc.entry: Community based circus centre, hires out space to performance groups as well as other users. Large high room with semi sprung floor. Priority will be given to circus and theatre performance. Stage with green room, seating 100 people maximum. Small kitchen with cafeteria area. Groups need to have their own event insurance. Full theatre lighting and sound system available to use at the venue for an additional hire fee.

ContactName.entry: Mr Craig Gamble Pugh/ Mrs Frances Joel
